Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to safe staffing for public employees of institutional settings
Summary: Relates to safe staffing for public employees of institutional settings by setting maximum overtime levels.
LawCode: Add ยง137, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to safe staffing for public employees of institutional settings
